title: [Health] A Low-carbohydrate, Ketogenic Diet Enhances Hippocampal Mitochondrial Bioenergetics and Efficiency -- Together, these findings add to growing support for the use of ketones and KDs in pathological brain states in which mitochondrial function is compromised, especially within the hippocampus.[inmice]
